Package SmartHome

Class SmartLight

java.lang.Object
SmartHouse.SmartDevice
SmartHouse.SmartLight
public class SmartLight extends SmartDevice
This class is used to set the brightness and color of a smart light. It also has a method to print the brightness and color. This class extends SmartHouse.SmartDevice.

  • Constructor Details

    • SmartLight

      public SmartLight(String deviceName, String roomLocation, boolean status)
      Parameters:
      deviceName - This parameter is used to set the device name. once inputted it will be set to the deviceName variable.
      roomLocation - This parameter is used to set the room location. once inputted it will be set to the roomLocation variable.
      status - This parameter is used to set the status. once inputted it will be set to the status variable.
